name: mjczone.dappermatic
description: Database schema management library for .NET applications using Dapper.

scripts.docs: dotnet test tests/MJCZone.DapperMatic.Tests --filter "Can_generate_docs" && cd ./docs && npm run docs:dev
scripts.format: dotnet tool install -g csharpier && csharpier format ./src/ && csharpier format ./tests/

author: mjczone
